title: Arcanum
notes: The menu redraws slowly, the map haven't finished loading in reasonable time. Worked perfectly in Wine with the Arcanum Multiverse patchset.

title: Arcanum
notes: Game starts, but menu is extremely laggy. Gets stuck in a loading screen upon trying to go ingame.

title: Arcanum
notes: No cursor in the menu, or just the redraw problem worsened.
Takes too long to load main menu, about 10 minutes to load game. Major issues with textures (many artifacts, invisible people, overlapping dialogs). Installing HD patch does not fix anything.
title: Arcanum: Of Steamworks and Magick Obscura
